item.title: Princess Tea Party
item.description: Last Saturday, my Grandma threw me and my friends a Princess Tea Party. My friend Zoee and her sisters showed up, all dressed as princesses. My sister Sarah and I were dressed up like princesses, too, of course. It was lotâ€™s of fun. Here are some photos of it.
